projects.title: Resume Screener API
projects.description: AI-powered resume screening system using FastAPI and machine learning to automatically evaluate and rank candidate resumes based on job requirements.

projects.title: ETL Data Pipeline Platform
projects.description: Scalable ETL platform for processing large datasets with automated data validation, transformation, and loading capabilities. Supports multiple data sources and formats.

projects.title: Real-time Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Interactive web dashboard for real-time data visualization and analytics. Features live data streaming, custom charts, and automated reporting capabilities.

projects.title: Smart Inventory Management
projects.description: Predictive inventory management system using machine learning to forecast demand and optimize stock levels. Reduces waste and improves efficiency.

projects.title: Social Media Sentiment Analyzer
projects.description: NLP-powered tool for analyzing sentiment trends across social media platforms. Provides insights for brand monitoring and market research.

projects.title: Automated Report Generator
projects.description: Automated business reporting system that generates custom reports from multiple data sources. Features scheduling, email delivery, and template customization.
